name: Beyond 12 Numbers - puzzle game
description:
• Combine three numbers to get higher number.
• Can you reach beyond 12.
• If you reach beyond 12 and see how far can you reach.
• Each time you play you get different color grids.
• Easy to play and hard.
• Simple puzzle game with number blocks.
• Join 3,4,5 even 9.
• 5 and 9 give you star number.
